Chromatography.name: Parameter Value[Column model]
Chromatography.description: Model or make of the of Column used, e.g C18

Chromatography.name: Parameter Value[Column type]
Chromatography.description: type of Chromatography used e.g reverse phase

Chromatography.name: Label
Chromatography.description: Indicates a chemical or biological marker, such as a radioactive isotope or a fluorescent dye which is bound to a material in order to make it detectable by some assay technology (e.g. P33, biotin, GFP).

Mass spectrometry.name: Parameter Value[Scan polarity]
Mass spectrometry.description: An acquisition mode to which specifies weather polarity is negative, positive or alternating.

Mass spectrometry.name: Parameter Value[Scan m/z range]
Mass spectrometry.description: The limit of m/z over which a mass spectrometer can detect ions. e.g 200-1000

Mass spectrometry.name: Parameter Value[Instrument]
Mass spectrometry.description: the name of the mass spectrometry instrument, manufacturer, model # operational software name operational software version

Mass spectrometry.name: Parameter Value[Ion source]
Mass spectrometry.description: the ion source use PSI-MS cv Ionization mode (EI, APCI, ESI#), vacuum pressure skimmer/focusing lens voltages (e.g. capillary voltage etc.) gas flows (e.g. nebulization gas, cone gas etc.) source temperature

Mass spectrometry.name: Parameter Value[Mass analyzer]
Mass spectrometry.description: the analyzer(s) used by the mass spectrometer, use PSI-MS cv

Mass spectrometry.name: MS Assay Name
Mass spectrometry.description: User-defined name for a MS assay.

Mass spectrometry.name: Raw Spectral Data File
Mass spectrometry.description: Name (or URI) of the raw spectral data file generated by an assay.

Data transformation.name: Normalization Name
Data transformation.description: User-defined name for each normalization applied

Data transformation.name: Derived Spectral Data File
Data transformation.description: Name (or URI) of the derived data file generated from spectral data by an assay.

Metabolite identification.name: Data Transformation Name
Metabolite identification.description: User-defined name for each data transformation applied

Metabolite identification.name: Metabolite Assignment File
Metabolite identification.description: Name (or URI) of the metabolite assignment file gathered for this assay.

Extraction_ms.name: Parameter Value[Post Extraction]
Extraction_ms.description: Extract concentration, Samples enrichment and resuspension processes e.g Dried under nitrogen, resuspended in H2O or pyridine, SPE column

Extraction_ms.name: Extract Name
Extraction_ms.description: User-defined names for each portion of extracted material.

NMR sample.name: Parameter Value[NMR tube type]
NMR sample.description: e.g. 5 mm conventional, Shigemi, mircocell etc.

NMR sample.name: Parameter Value[Temperature]
NMR sample.description: Sampel temperature run in the magnet, in Kelvin

NMR sample.name: Label
NMR sample.description: Indicates a chemical or biological marker or observed nucleus

NMR spectroscopy.name: Parameter Value[Instrument]
NMR spectroscopy.description: Name and model of the NMR instrument, e.g. Bruker Avance III, ...

NMR spectroscopy.name: Parameter Value[NMR Probe]
NMR spectroscopy.description: Type of probe fitted to the spectroscope e.g. 10mm 31P, 5mm HCN coldprobe, 3mm flow-probe, etc.

NMR spectroscopy.name: Parameter Value[Number of transients]
NMR spectroscopy.description: Number of transients (scan) acquired for your experiment. e.g 128 or 256

NMR spectroscopy.name: Parameter Value[Pulse sequence name]
NMR spectroscopy.description: Pulse sequence used to acquire the data, noesypr1d

NMR spectroscopy.name: Parameter Value[Magnetic field strength]
NMR spectroscopy.description: a parameter expressed in tesla to report the strength of the field e.g 14.1 T Varian Inova ; 18.8 T Bruker Avance

NMR spectroscopy.name: Acquisition Parameter Data File
NMR spectroscopy.description: Name (or URI) of the acquisition parameter data file gathered for this assay.

NMR assay.name: NMR Assay Name
NMR assay.description: User-defined name for a NMR assay.

NMR assay.name: Free Induction Decay Data File
NMR assay.description: Name (or URI) of the free induction decay data file gathered for this assay.

Extraction_nmr.name: Parameter Value[Extraction Method]
Extraction_nmr.description: extraction method used. e.g methanol/chloroform extration (1:1 v/v)

Extraction_nmr.name: Extract Name
Extraction_nmr.description: User-defined names for each portion of extracted material.
